name: endive
content:

(US also Belgian endive) a plant with thick, pale leaves that taste bitter and that are eaten cooked as a vegetable or in salads: Arrange 4-5 spears of endive across each plate. Grill the endives for 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Spoon the cheese mixture into a piping bag and pipe it into the endive leaves. Synonym
chicory
EVAfotografie/ iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
UK (US curly endive) a plant with curly green leaves that are eaten uncooked in salads: Radicchio and endive are popular salad leaves that are available all through winter. He makes a salad of endive and walnuts with a warm dressing. There was a beautiful display on the market stall of green frizzy endives and purple oak leaf lettuces. Synonym
frisée
Ross M. Horowitz/The Image Bank/GettyImages
